unnormalised: Gas Cylinder Prices Giving You Diwali Nightmares?
normalised: Gas Cylinder Prices Giving You Diwali Nightmares?

unnormalised: Looks like our wallets are taking another hit! The price of LPG cylinders has seen a bit of a jump, leaving many families scratching their heads, especially with Diwali just around the corner. Domestic cylinders are up by roughly Rs. 50, while the commercial ones used by chaiwalas and restaurants in places like Karol Bagh, Delhi, saw a bigger hike, impacting that weekend biryani craving.
normalised: Looks like our wallets are taking another hit! The price of L P G cylinders has seen a bit of a jump, leaving many families scratching their heads, especially with Diwali just around the corner. Domestic cylinders are up by roughly rupees fifty, while the commercial ones used by chaiwalas and restaurants in places like Karol Bagh, Delhi, saw a bigger hike, impacting that weekend biryani craving.

unnormalised: Experts are saying global crude oil prices are to blame, but honestly, it feels like just yesterday they were telling us prices were going down! Remember last month when they dipped slightly?
normalised: Experts are saying global crude oil prices are to blame, but honestly, it feels like just yesterday they were telling us prices were going down! Remember last month when they dipped slightly?

unnormalised: Meanwhile, folks in Kerala are probably thankful Onam is already done; imagine celebrating with gas prices this high! The ever-reliable Indane gas and Bharat Gas are affected.
normalised: Meanwhile, folks in Kerala are probably thankful Onam is already done; imagine celebrating with gas prices this high! The ever-reliable Indane gas and Bharat Gas are affected.

unnormalised: Analysts at ICICI Securities predict further fluctuations depending on the upcoming winter demand in Europe. Let’s hope things cool down soon, literally and figuratively. We need some relief!
normalised: Analysts at I C I C I Securities predict further fluctuations depending on the upcoming winter demand in Europe. Let’s hope things cool down soon, literally and figuratively. We need some relief!
